scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/digi-tran/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/digi-tran
  set jcr:title{String} to "Digi Tran"
end
create service user articlepubuserservice with path /home/users/system/dam/digitran

set ACL for articlepubuserservice
  allow jcr:all on /content
  allow jcr:read on /conf
end
